text: mou sa ban chhlaeyotb tha a l laoh ban mean bantoul yeang chbasa tha karpit meko noh ke min del yk tow braebreasa phchuor reasa deithli ning doek tuk sraochasrap damna te pol ku mean lokkhan penhlenh haeyka kmean pnr chamrouh der . puokke ban niyeay b nd tha ilauvnih anak ban phdal karpit haey . dau che neah puokke ka saamleh meko noh del puokke staerte min ach thveu ban
